description: Swap out cheese sauce for mozzarella and ricotta in this quicker and easier beef lasagna.
name: Quick Beef Lasagna with Mozzarella Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Sprinkle the top with parmesan, dot with basil leaved and bake for 45 minutes until golden and bubbling. Leave the lasagna stand for 10 minutes before cutting.
